course_description: Introduction to transition metal Organometallic chemistry. Structure of metal complexes, their reactivity, reaction mechanisms, catalysis and application in synthesis.
prerequisites: (CHEM 203 or CHEM 203Z or CHEM_OX 203) and (CHEM 203L or CHEM 203ZL or CHEM_OX 203L) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
